headlines.description: Manchester United matched a Premier League record of 27 matches unbeaten away from home with a 1-1 draw at Southampton on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd match Prem record with draw at Saints

headlines.description: Harry Kane made his return and Dele Alli was on target as Tottenham beat Wolves 1-0 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane returns as Tottenham edge past Wolves

headlines.description: Romelu Lukaku scored on his return to Chelsea as they eased to an impressive 2-0 win at Arsenal on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lukaku torments Arsenal as Chelsea ease to win
